comments.body: tempted to add a warning 'path not found'

I'm not 100% sure this is correct, or at least maybe not exact enough, although it probably works correct.

You could probably just do:
```
term_results = [to_text(g, errors='surrogate_or_strict') for g in globbed if os.path.isfile(g)]
if term_results:
    ret.extend(term_results)
    break
```
Effectively, it's the same result. But your code is slightly more efficient with less lines, so I changed it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@                    globbed = glob.glob(to_bytes(os.path.join(dwimmed_path, term_file), errors='surrogate_or_strict'))
                    term_results = [to_text(g, errors='surrogate_or_strict') for g in globbed if os.path.isfile(g)]
                    if term_results:
                        ret.extend(term_results)
                        break
